data.title: Memorable Milford history :: Milford, Connecticut :: Milford's settlers of 1639
data.meta_description: Milford Connecticut was founded in 1639, The first settlers were called the free planters
data.text: Milford Connecticut was founded in 1639. The scouting of the land was on February 12, 1639 with the purchase in August followed by walking to the land from New haven the next month. Early settlers that were church members were listed at the November 20, 1639 town meeting as the free planters. Non free-planters had settled at the same time but were not officially with the church. Those that came more than 5 years after the town's founding from about 1645 until 1700 are referred to as the after-planters.
